**Tender Notice**
================

**Title (English/French):** F7049-240039 - CCGS J.P. Tully - Sewage Treatment Plant / Station de traitement des eaux usées pour le NGCC J.P. Tully

**Reference Number (English/French)**: WS4611849149 / Numéro de référence: WS4611849149

**Amendment/Revision Number (English/French)**: 2 / Numéro de modification: 2

**Tender Closing Date (English/French)**: July 31, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT / Clôture de l'appel d'offres: 31 juillet 2024, 14h00 HE

**Tender Status (English/French)**: Expired / Statut de l'offre: Expiré

**Procurement Category (English/French)**: Goods and Services / Catégorie de la prestation: Biens et services

**UNSPSC**:
25111900 - Marine craft systems and subassemblies / Systèmes et sous-ensembles pour embarcations
Related Goods and Services require the specification of a UNSPSC. The procurement number for this tender is F7049-240039. It specifies that the requirement is for goods. This tender is mandatory. 

**Procurement Description**: 
The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is seeking bids for a new Sewage Treatment Plant system for the CCGS John P. Tully. The existing system is a membrane type system, which is to be replaced with a biological type system. All deliverables must be received on or before August 29, 2025. 

The Offeror’s conference and a site visit at the Institute of Ocean Sciences at West Saanich Road will take place.

**Contact and Bidding Information**: 

Bidders must refer to the e-commerce tendering system for documents. For further information, contact:

Mary Parsons (SPAC/PSPC)  
mary.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
